unnormalised: The Ministry of Education has mandated that all students appearing for the NEET exam from the yr 2025 onwards must link their Aadhaar No. with their application. This initiative, announced on 18/07/2024, aims to streamline the verification process and prevent impersonation. Students are advised to visit the official NTA website and follow the instructions carefully.
normalised: The Ministry of Education has mandated that all students appearing for the N-E-E-T exam from the year two thousand and twenty five onwards must link their Aadhaar Number with their application. This initiative, announced on eighteenth July two thousand and twenty four, aims to streamline the verification process and prevent impersonation. Students are advised to visit the official N-T-A website and follow the instructions carefully.

unnormalised: Furthermore, the Department of Labour is urging all employers to register their employees' Universal Account Number (UAN) on the ESIC portal before 31/12/2024. This is crucial for ensuring that employees can access their EPF benefits seamlessly. The circular, numbered DL/ESIC/2024/007, details the procedure.
normalised: Furthermore, the Department of Labour is urging all employers to register their employees' Universal Account Number (U-A-N) on the E-S-I-C portal before thirty first December two thousand and twenty four. This is crucial for ensuring that employees can access their E-P-F benefits seamlessly. The circular, numbered D-L slash E-S-I-C slash two thousand and twenty four slash double zero seven, details the procedure.

unnormalised: For job seekers, it's increasingly important to keep your LinkedIn profile updated with verifiable details such as employee ID (if applicable), educational certificates, and any relevant skill certifications. Many companies now use these identifiers for background checks, making the process more efficient. So, remember to cross-verify that you have correctly entered your marks (ex: 95.6% in Class X), and your roll number (eg: 1234567890).
normalised: For job seekers, it's increasingly important to keep your LinkedIn profile updated with verifiable details such as employee I-D (if applicable), educational certificates, and any relevant skill certifications. Many companies now use these identifiers for background checks, making the process more efficient. So, remember to cross-verify that you have correctly entered your marks (example: ninety five point six percent in Class ten), and your roll number (example: one two three four five six seven eight nine zero).
